Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Static code analysis is run, but the errors are currently ignored.

Action.author: stevegoob
Action.body: Actually ~esplinr , this is about code coverage metrics, not static analysis. I'm going to switch this back to being in Review since my PR|https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/pull/1591 for this functionality is still awaiting approval.
